raw_body: At rest with Jesus. Daughter of the late Mr. & Mrs. John de S. Ranasinghe, sister of the late Watson, Girla, Margie, Joyce, Tinie, Bridget, Rodney and of Noeline and Maurille, sister-in-law of the late Mignonne, Bala, Claude, Michael, Brendan, Philomina, Doreen. Cortege leaves Barney Raymond’s Funeral Parlour, 21st December 2023 for cremation at General Cemetery, Kanatte at 3 p.m. 362852
